column4: Hey all I'm just wondering I installed ubuntu off an iso through windows today. It worked fine and now for some reason it wants to download another 700mb worth of files just to install off the iso.....does anyone know what though would.
and with the current state of my net id rather not.
security updates and bug fixes i'd assume. did you download 8.10?
type "echo $PATH". the order of the directories listed there reflects priority
